title: The project bundle
body: Hey, im just wondering if you get the first strike cards if you buy the project skins through the bundle. Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey Tae13,

If you buy the bundle, you'll receive all of the First Strike loading screen cards. (First Strike cards are also given if a PROJECT: skin is gifted to someone through September 15th.)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=8iuQ5xl8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-09T16:57:55.727+0000)
>
> Hey Tae13,
> 
> If you buy the bundle, you'll receive all of the First Strike loading screen cards.** (First Strike cards are also given if a PROJECT: skin is gifted to someone through September 15th.)
**


I don't believe you. You should try to gift me so I can test it out for you.

http://www.auplod.com/u/auopld60eff.png
Yes you do. I just bought the bundle and I have all of the first strike cards
